column5: Can build us one of these?
You are starting on a bad premise you are using a Harley instead of a real Motorcycle lol.    Art

For one thing it won't work, it's an oil dripper. Secondly the first bump you'd hit, the blade would dig in and you'll be a flying missle over the handlebars.  Third, noisy bikes are for those that have __________ and have to compensate.  Hahahaha, he beat me to it..
Joe and I have restored boats, bikes and cars etc. if it is metal or has a motor it is a candidate for a winter restoration.   Art
Get some air out of those tires and send one to Simon for his rink.
